channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: New year, new pygmy hippo: A naming poll for this Virginia zoo baby is underway
item.description: Moo Deng and Haggis are joined by another slick, round supreme on the scene. Fans of the new baby can cast their vote to name her until New Year's Eve, with the winning name announced the next day.
item.content:encoded:
Moo Deng and Haggis are joined by another slick, round supreme on the scene. Fans of the new baby can cast their vote to name her until New Year's Eve, with the winning name announced the next day.

(Image credit: Metro Richmond Zoo)
item.dc:creator: Manuela López Restrepo

item.title: A sea turtle plagued by 'bubble butt' condition is helped by a 3D printer
item.description: "Bubble butt" can leave turtles struggling to swim normally — or unable to submerge at all. A 3D-printed harness can help.
item.content:encoded: "Bubble butt" can leave turtles struggling to swim normally — or unable to submerge at all. A 3D-printed harness can help.
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell

item.title: Curious about Dry January? What to expect — and how it works
item.description: If your New Year's resolution is to give up drinking for the month of January, this expert guide can help you get to Day 31 alcohol-free.
item.content:encoded:
If your New Year's resolution is to give up drinking for the month of January, this expert guide can help you get to Day 31 alcohol-free.

(Image credit: Photo Illustration by Beck Harlan)
item.dc:creator: Marielle Segarra

item.title: With Trump's Panama Canal talk, it feels like 1976 all over again
item.description: It's unclear how the issue of ownership of the Panama Canal became a talking point for President-elect Donald Trump this week, but the question has a long political history.
item.content:encoded:
It's unclear how the issue of ownership of the Panama Canal became a talking point for President-elect Donald Trump this week, but the question has a long political history.

(Image credit: Martin Bernetti)
item.dc:creator: Ron Elving

item.title: Winning ticket for $1.22 billion lottery jackpot sold in California, Mega Millions says
item.description: After three months without anyone winning the top prize in the lottery, a ticket worth an estimated $1.22 billion was sold in California for the drawing Friday night.
item.content:encoded:
After three months without anyone winning the top prize in the lottery, a ticket worth an estimated $1.22 billion was sold in California for the drawing Friday night.

(Image credit: Jeff Chiu)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Trump asks the Supreme Court to delay the start of the TikTok ban
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump asked the Supreme Court on Friday to pause the potential TikTok ban from going into effect until his administration can pursue a "political resolution" to the issue.
item.content:encoded:
President-elect Donald Trump asked the Supreme Court on Friday to pause the potential TikTok ban from going into effect until his administration can pursue a "political resolution" to the issue.

(Image credit: Damian Dovarganes)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: U.S. homelessness jumps to another record high, amid affordable housing shortage
item.description: The annual federal count finds more than 770,000 people living in shelters or outside. It cites rising rents and the recent surge in migrants as key factors behind the increase.
item.content:encoded:
The annual federal count finds more than 770,000 people living in shelters or outside. It cites rising rents and the recent surge in migrants as key factors behind the increase.

(Image credit: Rebecca Blackwell)
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Ludden

item.title: Sportscaster Greg Gumbel dies at age 78
item.description: Greg Gumbel, a longtime CBS sportscaster, has died from cancer, according to a statement from family released by CBS on Friday. He was 78.
item.content:encoded:
Greg Gumbel, a longtime CBS sportscaster, has died from cancer, according to a statement from family released by CBS on Friday. He was 78.

(Image credit: Eric Gay)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Costco egg recall for salmonella receives FDA's most severe designation
item.description: The FDA has classified its recall of eggs sold under Costco's Kirkland brand as a Class I recall, a designation reserved for instances of the highest potential health risk — including death.
item.content:encoded: The FDA has classified its recall of eggs sold under Costco's Kirkland brand as a Class I recall, a designation reserved for instances of the highest potential health risk — including death.
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell

item.title: Syria's U.S.-backed Kurdish coalition faces an uncertain future after Assad's ouster
item.description: After Bashar al-Assad's ouster, there are questions about the fate of the Syrian Democratic Forces, the U.S.-backed Kurdish coalition that currently controls a third of Syrian territory.
item.content:encoded:
After Bashar al-Assad's ouster, there are questions about the fate of the Syrian Democratic Forces, the U.S.-backed Kurdish coalition that currently controls a third of Syrian territory.

(Image credit: Baderkhan Ahmad)
item.dc:creator: Fatma Tanis
